title: System vs User vs Assistant Messages
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on System vs User vs Assistant Messages.

hook.text: You set a persona in the system message, but the model ignores it. Why?

buildup.text: Chat APIs split conversations into system, user, and assistant messages.

discovery.text: System sets behavior rules. User provides input. Assistant is the model's reply.

climax.text: Keep system messages short, specific, and reinforce them in early user turns.

quiz.question: What is the purpose of a system message?
options: Sets behavior rules for the model
